#summary Installation of OpenVPN client on Windows

*This is a page in progress, information here is probably not useful for anyone, except the one making this page*

= Installation of the OpenVPN client on Windows =

  * Download the OpenVPN package from [http://openvpn.se/files/install_packages/openvpn-2.0.9-gui-1.0.3-install.exe here] (or [http://openvpn.se/download.html]). If it askes, save the file on the Desktop
  * Start the installation by double clicking on the openvpn-2.0.9-gui-1.0.3-install.exe file.
  * If asked or the application is trustable, choose run.
  * Choose next and I agree until the following screen.
  * Select "My Certificate Wizard" and deselect "TAP-Win32 Virtual Ethernet Adapter"
  * Choose next (2x)
  * Choose Install
  * Choose Finish

  * Start the Certificate Wizard by going to Start-> All Programs -> OpenVPN -> My Certificate Wizard
